data.name: Crossing Man
data.detailed_description:
Cross or you will die.
You become a public enemy in the skyscrapers!
Cross the buildings and run away from killers chasing you.

You can feel electrifying tension at the Crossing Man.

You, who came to the top of the building chased by enemies!
The only option you have is to cross the building.

Walking on the rope in narrow balance.
While you are falling off the roof, grab rappel and move to another building!
Don't stop. You don't have time to stop!

How To Use Controllers

  • Vive Controller :
    You can select or activate something through trigger.
    And you can move in game by pressing touch-pad.
    Specific point, you need to walk yourself.
  • Oculus Touch Controller :
    At Oculus, you can select or activate something through trigger too.
    And you can move in game through joystick.
    Specific point, you need to walk yourself.
  • Windows Mixed Reality Motion Controller :
    You can select or activate something through trigger too.
    And you can move in game through joystick.
    Specific point, you need to walk yourself.

data.short_description: Cross or you will die. You become a public enemy in the skyscrapers! Cross the buildings and run away from killers chasing you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX™ 8350 equal or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 equal or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX™ 8370 equal or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeo RX 480 equal or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
